nl: Let $x$ be an element of $G$. Prove that $x^2=1$ if and only if $|x|$ is either $1$ or $2$.
lean:
∀ {G : Type*} [Group G]
  (x : G), x ^ 2 = 1 ↔ (orderOf x = 1 ∨ orderOf x = 2)
candidate: ∀ {G : Type*} [Group G] (x : G), x^2 = 1 ↔ orderOf x = 1 ∨ orderOf x = 2
imports:
import Mathlib

open Fintype Subgroup Set Polynomial Ideal
open scoped BigOperators
